text: Daniel Slawson Horton (born December 24, 1879, date of death unknown) was an American track and field athlete who competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Paris, France. He was born in New York City. Horton competed in the triple jump. His place and distance are unknown, though he did not finish in the top six. Similarly, he did not make the top four in the standing triple jump. ==References== * De Wael, Herman. Herman's Full Olympians: "Athletics 1900". Accessed 18 March 2006. title: Daniel Horton (athlete)
